skins.shipDescription: Fast Battleship, second ship of the Kongou-class Hiei.
skins.selfIntroduction: Once my big sister Kongou comes back, we're going to shock the world! Until then, I need to work hard to become a leader worthy of her! But.... courtly etiquette is really hard.....
skins.acquisition: Commander? When I grow up, I¡¯m going to serve the strongest lord in the world! Oh... but for now, I don¡¯t mind if you help me sharpen my skills.
skins.login: Good da- agh! Wahh... I hit myself with my sword.
skins.details: Why are you staring at me? ...is my sword too heavy? I- I can take care of myself! It's none of your business!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Make merry? I'd love to! Where are we- oh, no. Now isn't the time for such things!
skins.secretaryIdle2: My sisters went to a place called "Royal" to study aboard... abroad? Study abroad. Hmph! I bet you don't even know what abroad is!
skins.secretaryIdle3: If you keep staring at me, I'm going to hit you with this! And it's going to hurt!
skins.secretaryTouch: Do you have anything that needs doing? I must test myself yet!
